EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Having trouble viewing this email? View in Web Browser <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]>.
<[[http://www.martell.com/en-my/]]>
<[[http://www.martell.com/en-my/]]>
Thank you for being a part of
Martell Malaysia's event.
We want to make sure that you’re not missing out. You'll be the first to know of Martell's events, exclusive products, and members-only promotions across the region.
And for more about our brand story, craftsmanship and products visit Martell Malaysia <[[http://www.martell.com/en-my/]]>.
<[[https://www.facebook.com/Martell.my/]]>
<[[https://www.instagram.com/martellcognac/]]>

<[[https://www.youtube.com/user/Martell]]>

If you no longer wish to receive these emails you may unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> at any time.
